TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HelpEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户请求控件帮助时发生事件。The event occurs when the user requests help for a control. A对象指定在鼠标指针和是否处理过此事件的屏幕坐标。A object specifies the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer and whether the event was handled. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件以便包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过按 F1 键和焦点位于地址字段中，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击帮助光标地址字段上的引发事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 属性设置为 true，则指示`HelpRequested`处理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示存储中的帮助文本属性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过该帮助事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the help event was handled.

value.span: 如果处理过事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the event is handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你未设置为此属性`true`事件将传递给 Windows 以进行其他处理。If you do not set this property to `true` the event will be passed to Windows for additional processing. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件以便包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过按 F1 键和焦点位于地址字段中，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击帮助光标地址字段上的引发事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 属性设置为 true，则指示`HelpRequested`处理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示存储中的帮助文本属性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MousePos As Point
public: property System::Drawing::Point MousePos { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针的屏幕坐标。

span.span: Gets the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.

value.span: 表示鼠标指针屏幕坐标的 。

span.span: A representing the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此信息可用于提供基于在鼠标指针的位置上的帮助。You can use this information to provide help based on the position of the mouse pointer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#39)]
